016package de.cuioss.uimodel.field;
017
018import static de.cuioss.tools.collect.CollectionLiterals.immutableSet;
019
020import java.io.Serializable;
021import java.util.Set;
022
023import de.cuioss.uimodel.field.impl.BooleanEditableField;
024import de.cuioss.uimodel.field.impl.DoubleEditableField;
025import de.cuioss.uimodel.field.impl.FloatEditableField;
026import de.cuioss.uimodel.field.impl.IntegerEditableField;
027import de.cuioss.uimodel.field.impl.LongEditableField;
028import de.cuioss.uimodel.field.impl.StringEditableField;
029import lombok.AccessLevel;
030import lombok.Getter;
031import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
032
033/**
034 * Runtime information of {@link DynamicField} regarding the concrete wrapped
035 * type
036 *
037 * @author Oliver Wolff
038 */
039@RequiredArgsConstructor(access = AccessLevel.PRIVATE)
040@SuppressWarnings("unchecked") // owolff: We need to find a better way for implementing the factory
041public enum DynamicFieldType {
042
043    /** Represents a {@link DynamicField} for {@link Boolean}. */
044    BOOLEAN(Boolean.class, "boolean") {
045
046        @Override
047        public DynamicField<Boolean> createDynamicField(final Serializable value, final boolean editable) {
048            return new BooleanEditableField((Boolean) value, editable);
049        }
050    },
051
052    /** Represents a {@link DynamicField} for {@link String}. */
053    STRING(String.class, "String") {
054
055        @Override
056        public DynamicField<String> createDynamicField(final Serializable value, final boolean editable) {
057            String stringValue = null;
058            if (value != null) {
059                stringValue = String.valueOf(value);
060            }
061            return new StringEditableField(stringValue, editable);
062        }
063    },
064
065    /** Represents a {@link DynamicField} for {@link Integer}. */
066    INTEGER(Integer.class, "int") {
067
068        @Override
069        public DynamicField<Integer> createDynamicField(final Serializable value, final boolean editable) {
070            return new IntegerEditableField((Integer) value, editable);
071        }
072    },
073
074    /** Represents a {@link DynamicField} for {@link Long}. */
075    LONG(Long.class, "long") {
076
077        @Override
078        public DynamicField<Long> createDynamicField(final Serializable value, final boolean editable) {
079            return new LongEditableField((Long) value, editable);
080        }
081    },
082
083    /** Represents a {@link DynamicField} for {@link Long}. */
084    FLOAT(Float.class, "float") {
085
086        @Override
087        public DynamicField<Float> createDynamicField(final Serializable value, final boolean editable) {
088            return new FloatEditableField((Float) value, editable);
089        }
090    },
091
092    /** Represents a {@link DynamicField} for {@link Double}. */
093    DOUBLE(Double.class, "double") {
094
095        @Override
096        public DynamicField<Double> createDynamicField(final Serializable value, final boolean editable) {
097            return new DoubleEditableField((Double) value, editable);
098        }
099    };
100
101    /** This set defines all elements that are a number. */
102    @SuppressWarnings("java:S2386") // owolff: False Positive -> immutable
103    public static final Set<DynamicFieldType> NUMBER_SET = immutableSet(INTEGER, LONG, FLOAT, DOUBLE);
104
105    @Getter
106    private final Class<? extends Serializable> wrapperType;
107
108    @Getter
109    private final String primitiveName;
110
111    /**
112     * @return boolean indicating whether the types represents a boolean field
113     */
114    public boolean isBooleanField() {
115        return BOOLEAN.equals(this);
116    }
117
118    /**
119     * Factory method for creating a corresponding instance of {@link DynamicField}.
120     *
121     * @param value    may be null
122     * @param editable indicates whether the field is editable.
123     * @return corresponding instance of {@link DynamicField}.
124     */
125    public abstract <T extends Serializable> DynamicField<T> createDynamicField(T value, boolean editable);
126
127    /**
128     * Factory method for creating an {@link DynamicFieldType} identified by the
129     * given type. In case there is no fitting type it will return
130     * {@link DynamicFieldType#STRING}
131     *
132     * @param type must not be null
133     * @return {@link DynamicFieldType} identified by the given type. In case there
134     *         is no fitting type it will return {@link DynamicFieldType#STRING}
135     */
136    public static final DynamicFieldType getByTypeString(final String type) {
137        var fieldType = DynamicFieldType.STRING;
138
139        for (final DynamicFieldType dynamicFieldType : DynamicFieldType.values()) {
140            if (dynamicFieldType.getWrapperType().getName().equals(type)
141                    || dynamicFieldType.primitiveName.equals(type)) {
142                fieldType = dynamicFieldType;
143                break;
144            }
145        }
146
147        return fieldType;
148    }
149
150}
